thread.title: Tiny wireless light kept aloft with ultrasonic waves

title: Tiny wireless light kept aloft with ultrasonic waves
text:
Tiny wireless light kept aloft with ultrasonic waves 1:36pm GMT - 01:14 
Researchers use ultrasonic waves to keep a tiny LED floating in mid air while powering it wirelessly through induction. Stuart McDill reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Researchers use ultrasonic waves to keep a tiny LED floating in mid air while powering it wirelessly through induction. Stuart McDill reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2EKV4fE
